ID EMAIL FIRSTNAME LASTNAME AVATAR
"id" ={{item.id}} "email"={{item.email}} "firstname"={{item.first_name}} "lastname"={{item.last_name}} "avatar"={{item.avatar}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { SharedService } from "./service/shared.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { title = 'smartypants'; userData:any =[]; td:any; constructor(private ser:SharedService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.getData(); } getData(){ this.ser.getBackData().subscribe((res:any)=>{ this.userData = res; console.log(res); }) } }
